title: DateTime
description: A combination of date and time of day in the form `[-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]`.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

value.description: The date as an ISO 8601 string.
